title: Everything you need to know for all four NFL divisional games: Score picks, predictions and storylines

title: Sources: Mets, Bichette reach 3-year, $126M deal
description: After missing out on Kyle Tucker, the Mets have agreed to a three-year, $126 million contract with Bo Bichette, sources confirmed to ESPN. New York plans to play Bichette at third base for the first time in his pro career.
